t: Amazon Fresh Groceries - Pay with SNAP EBT
s: The SNAP EBT page enables customers to add their EBT card to their Amazon account while shopping eligible products and discounts. Amazon Fresh accepts SNAP EBT benefits in all eligible regions.

t: Discounted Amazon Prime for qualifying EBT and government assistance recipients
s: Customers who receive eligible government assistance, such as SNAP or Medicaid, or belong to households with income within 150% of the Federal Poverty Guideline are qualified for Prime Access.

t: SNAP Benefits: Amazon Offers a Discount on Prime Membership With Your EBT Card | GOBankingRates
s: May 26, 2023 - Even after raising its annual regular price for Amazon Prime recently, Amazon offers ways for certain customers to save money. Shoppers who are recipients of SNAP and SNAP EBT Cash benefits (or Medicaid benefits) may qualify to save more than 50% off their Prime membership.

t: How to use SNAP EBT benefits on Amazon
s: Amazon Access is a one-stop shop ... on Amazon even easier and more affordable, including information on Prime Access, the discounted membership program for qualifying government assistance recipients and income-verified customers. It’s not just about free shipping and Prime Video. Prime keeps money back in your pocket. Did you know that a Prime membership isn’t required to shop using Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) EBT benefits ...

t: Snap shares jump on deal with Amazon that lets users buy products without changing apps
s: November 14, 2023 - Last month, Snap reported a 5% increase in year-over-year revenue for the third quarter following two straight periods of shrinkage. Still, the company said it wasn't providing formal guidance, warning investors that it "observed pauses in spending from a large number of primarily brand-oriented advertising campaigns immediately following the onset of the war in the Middle East."
